attributes.action: Review CMS in respect of self-employed non-resident parents.
attributes.additional_details: I’m sure I’m not the only single parent struggling every month because the parent manipulates their annual earnings, by using a ‘dodgy’ accountant and getting bigger tax write offs. It is really unfair and stressful that they can do this to the child. We need to CMS process looking into
attributes.background:
review of Child Maintenance Services in respect of self-employed non-resident parents.

Take a closer look at their tax rebates, the accountants, if they are doing high tax write offs to look like they earn less for CMS

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition which calls for a similar action: 

Review powers of Child Maintenance Service regarding concealed income  

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709484
